entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
